t: Truck Bedliner by Rugged Liner
s: Choose Under-the-Rail, or Over-the-Rail. Made in the USA patented Rugged Liner bedliners provide your truck with tough, affordable protection. The one piece heavy duty bedliner simply snaps into place. A tailgate liner is included with most trucks and usually installs with your existing screws.
